snippet: Monument makers say churches that sell headstones have an economic advantage because of their tax exemptions. The archdiocese argues that the ban is unconstitutional.
abstract: Archdiocese of Newark files lawsuit challenging constitutionality of New Jersey law that makes it illegal for archdiocese to sell headstone and mausoleums at its cemeteries.
lead_paragraph: Monument makers say churches that sell headstones have an economic advantage because of their tax exemptions. The archdiocese argues that the ban is unconstitutional.

headline.main: Archdiocese Disputes Ban on It Selling Headstones
headline.print_headline: Archdiocese Disputes Ban on It Selling Headstones

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Catholic Cemeteries of the Archdiocese of Newark
